channel.title: Digital gardens on
channel.description: Recent content in Digital gardens on

item.description: https://www.technologyreview.com/2020/09/03/1007716/digital-gardens-let-you-cultivate-your-own-little-bit-of-the-internet/ First introduction to digital gardens, with many nice examples. Makes me want to start right away. https://www.conordewey.com/blog/on-digital-gardening/ A digital garden is an online space at the intersection of a notebook and a blog, **where digital gardeners share seeds of thoughts to be cultivated in public**.
